question: How does the content of social media posts from data science leaders correlate with their organization’s technology adoption trends within the past year?

subtasks.task: Gather social media posts from data science leaders over the past year. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
Identify technology adoption trends within these organizations. [CompanyTechStack]
Analyze the correlation between the content of social media posts and technology adoption trends. [PersonaLinkedinPost, CompanyTechStack]
